ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the Cluster  3 FGM Prime Parameters (spin averaged). The parameters are a status word, the three averaged components of the magnetic field vector in the GSE coordinate system and 2 variances.

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 FGM Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3  Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer magnetic field vector at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 FGM Magnetic field magnitude
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3  Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer magnetic field magnitude at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 FGM Normalized Magnetic Field Variance Summed B_nsigma_t
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3 Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized magnetic field variance summed, which is equivalent to the sum over the component variances, at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 FGM Normalized Variance of the Magnetic Field Magnitude B_nsigma_b
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3 Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized variance of the magnetic field magnitude at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3  FGM Status
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3 Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer status at spin time resolution
